# contactIdentifier

**Instance Property**

The identifier for the call recipient.

## Declaration

```swift
var contactIdentifier: String? { get set }
```

## Discussion

The identifier is displayed in the native call UI, and is typically the name of the call recipient.

If a caller corresponds to a [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Contacts/CNContact] object, set this to the value of the [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Contacts/CNContact/identifier] property of the contact.

## Accessing Action Attributes

- **isVideo**: A Boolean value that indicates whether the call is a video call.
- **handle**: The handle of the call recipient.
